hero.description: Hi, I’m Aybike. I’m a full-stack developer. If you are looking for a Developer who to craft solid and scalable frontend products with great user experiences. Let’s shake hands with me.

skillsListItem.item: I use JavaScript as the foundation of my frontend projects. I enjoy writing clean, efficient code to build interactive user interfaces.
With React, I create scalable and component-based UIs. I’ve built multiple real-world projects using hooks, context API, and responsive design principles.
I use Node.js to develop back-end services and APIs that support my frontend applications. It helps me complete full-stack project workflows more efficiently.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description9: Hi! I’m a Frontend Developer focused on building modern, responsive interfaces. I create fast and user-friendly web apps using React, Tailwind, and Bootstrap. I'm detail-oriented, eager to learn, and love making a difference through clean UI development.

projectsList.name: Teknolojik Yemekler - SPA
projectsList.description: In this project, I built a pizza ordering app using React. I focused on form validation, state management, multi-selection logic, and API communication with Axios. Order data was passed to the confirmation page using prop lifting. I also implemented Cypress tests to cover user flows.

projectsList.name: Random Jokes
projectsList.description: A simple, customizable, minimal setup cookie plugin that allows your users to select which cookies to accept or decline. This was created with vanilla JS, SCSS and Parcel Bundler and is available as a NPM package and the git repository makes any type of customization to code and themes possible.
